markdownRemark.excerpt: Options Another angle Grab a reference of a figure, draw it from another angle Next moment Grab a reference of a moving figure, draw the next movement…
markdownRemark.html:
Options

Another angle

Grab a reference of a figure, draw it from another angle

Next moment

Grab a reference of a moving figure, draw the next movement

Exaggerate

Draw a figure (with or without reference), exaggerate the pose, exaggerate the exaggeration

Anatomy study

Pick a body part, study it ¯_(ツ)_/¯

Resources

The Natural Way to Draw by Kimon Nicolaides
